name: the music while the music lasts

state.value:
This graph uses a TensorFlow model trained over Yamaha e-Piano competition data to output MIDI data to a MIDI-out device connected to your computer. If you don't have a midi-out device connected, this won't do anything, but you can try one of the soundfont examples that use this RNN model, though midi devices tend to sound the best.

Recommended virtual instrument is a tenor choir. It is the most eternal. and eliot tells me that you are the music while the music lasts.
